name: RoiText - Text Blast, Email, Voice, Social & IM
tag_list: text-blast, sms-marketing, mobile-text, sms-text-blast, sms-text, email-marketing, voice-broadcasting
overview:
RoiText is the largest provider in All-In-One marketing solutions, Such as Mobile Text, Unlimited Email, Voice Broadcast & Social Media!

Our services are offered to large and small businesses around the U.S. Our packages at RoiText start at only $10 a month. We guarantee that the we have the perfect package for your budget and marketing needs. The marketing solutions offered at RoiText will help you increase profits, create awareness of your brand and most importantly improve customer loyalty.
